div.style: align-items: center; background-image: linear-gradient(to right, rgb(226, 226, 226), rgb(201, 214, 255)); color: rgb(187, 187, 187); display: flex; font-family: "Segoe WPC", "Segoe UI", sans-serif; font-size: 13px; inline-size: 686px; justify-content: center; padding-block: 30px; padding: 30px; padding-inline: 30px; scrollbar-color: rgba(78, 86, 102, 0.5) rgb(0, 0, 0); unicode-bidi: isolate; width: 686px; border-radius: 5px; border-end-end-radius: 5px; border-end-start-radius: 5px; border-start-end-radius: 5px; border-start-start-radius: 5px; box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3) 0px 20px 60px 0px; display: flex; min-inline-size: 100px; min-width: 100px; overflow-block: hidden; overflow-inline: hidden; overflow: hidden; transition-duration: 0.2s; transition-property: opacity; unicode-bidi: isolate;

align-items: center; background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); block-size: 35px; border-start-end-radius: 5px; border-start-start-radius: 5px; border-top-left-radius: 5px; border-top-right-radius: 5px; cursor: default; display: flex; height: 35px; padding-block: 3px; padding: 3px 18px; padding-inline: 18px; unicode-bidi: isolate;

background-color: rgb(255, 95, 85); block-size: 10px; border-radius: 50%; border-end-end-radius: 50%; border-end-start-radius: 50%; border-start-end-radius: 50%; border-start-start-radius: 50%; height: 10px; inline-size: 10px; margin-inline-end: 5px; margin-right: 5px; unicode-bidi: isolate; width: 10px;
